# Working with Layers

Layers control the stacking order and organization of templates.

## Understanding Layers

Layers determine how templates composite:
- Higher layer numbers appear on top
- Multiple templates can share a layer
- Each layer can be independently controlled

## Layer Structure

```
Layer 4 (Top)     - Alerts, tickers
Layer 3           - Full screen graphics
Layer 2           - Bugs, scores
Layer 1 (Bottom)  - Lower thirds
```

## Managing Layers

### Creating Layers

Layers are automatically created when you assign a template.

### Reordering

Drag templates between layers in the Layers panel.

### Visibility

Toggle layer visibility for preview without affecting output.

## Common Layer Setups

### News Production

| Layer | Content |
|-------|---------|
| 4 | Breaking news banner |
| 3 | Full screen graphics |
| 2 | Logo bug |
| 1 | Lower thirds |

### Sports Production

| Layer | Content |
|-------|---------|
| 4 | Score ticker |
| 3 | Statistics overlays |
| 2 | Score bug |
| 1 | Player identifications |

## Best Practices

- Plan layer structure before creating templates
- Use consistent layer assignments
- Document layer purposes for team reference
